org.seedstack.crud.rest

Class PaginationParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.crud.rest.PaginationParams

  • public class PaginationParams
extends Object
    Groups all JAX-RS query parameters supporting the various pagination modes (attribute based, offset-based and page-based).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PaginationParams() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAttribute()
      If pagination is attribute-based, returns the attribute that should be used.
      Long getLimit()
      Returns the limit if it has been specified.
      Long getOffset()
      If pagination is offset-based, returns the number of items to skip.
      Long getPage()
      If pagination is page-based, returns the index of the page.
      String getValue()
      If pagination is attribute-based, returns the value that should act as the upper value.
      boolean hasLimit()
      Returns true if a limit has been specified.
      boolean hasPagination()
      Returns if pagination should be enabled.
      boolean isAttributeBased()
      Returns if pagination is attribute based.
      boolean isOffsetBased()
      Returns if pagination is offset based.
      boolean isPageBased()
      Returns if pagination is page based.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public PaginationParams()

    • Method Detail

      • getAttribute

        public String getAttribute()
        If pagination is attribute-based, returns the attribute that should be used.
        Returns:
        the path to the attribute used for attribute-based pagination.

      • getLimit

        public Long getLimit()
        Returns the limit if it has been specified.
        Returns:
        the limit if specified, null otherwise.

      • getOffset

        public Long getOffset()
        If pagination is offset-based, returns the number of items to skip.
        Returns:
        the number of items to skip.

      • getPage

        public Long getPage()
        If pagination is page-based, returns the index of the page. Whether this index is 0-based or 1-based, depends on the business framework configuration.
        Returns:
        the index of the page.

      • getValue

        public String getValue()
        If pagination is attribute-based, returns the value that should act as the upper value.
        Returns:
        the value used as the upper value for attribute-based pagination.

      • hasLimit

        public boolean hasLimit()
        Returns true if a limit has been specified.
        Returns:
        true if a limit has been specified, false otherwise.

      • hasPagination

        public boolean hasPagination()
        Returns if pagination should be enabled.
        Returns:
        true if pagination should be enabled, false otherwise.

      • isAttributeBased

        public boolean isAttributeBased()
        Returns if pagination is attribute based.
        Returns:
        true if pagination is attribute based, false otherwise.

      • isOffsetBased

        public boolean isOffsetBased()
        Returns if pagination is offset based.
        Returns:
        true if pagination is offset based, false otherwise.

      • isPageBased

        public boolean isPageBased()
        Returns if pagination is page based.
        Returns:
        true if pagination is page based, false otherwise.
